actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement persistence of rolling window API performance metrics to Redis for durability and multi-instance aggregation. This will ensure that performance data is not lost on server restart and can be aggregated across multiple instances.
implementation_steps: Add Redis client setup in src/utils/redis.js if not already present.
Modify scripts/bench/api-latency.js to write rolling window metrics to Redis after each run.
Update performance middleware to read/write rolling window data from/to Redis.
Test persistence by restarting the server and verifying metrics are retained.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and commit a migration plan for converting backend modules with high change-rate (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) to TypeScript. This plan should outline the order of migration, key type definitions, and any blockers.
implementation_steps: Create MIGRATION_PLAN.md outlining migration order and rationale.
Identify and list all high-change files in src/api/routes/* and src/chat/*.
Draft initial type definitions for shared data structures.
Commit the plan and circulate for team review.

actionable_tasks.title: Containerize Node Backend with Simple Dockerfile
actionable_tasks.description: Write a basic Dockerfile for the Node backend service to enable containerized development and deployment. Ensure the Dockerfile supports local development with hot-reload.
implementation_steps: Create Dockerfile.backend in the project root.
Configure the Dockerfile to install dependencies, copy source, and set up the entrypoint.
Add instructions for local development (e.g., mounting source for hot-reload) to README.md.
Test by building and running the container locally.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Add new Jest tests to cover MCP endpoints and provider health checks, focusing on integration and basic security (e.g., input validation, error handling).
implementation_steps: Identify untested MCP endpoints and provider health routes.
Write integration tests for each endpoint, including edge cases.
Add basic security tests for input validation and error scenarios.
Run tests and ensure coverage increases.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedChatInterface: Provider Quick-Switch and Badge
actionable_tasks.description: Add a provider quick-switch dropdown and current provider badge to EnhancedChatInterface.jsx using the useLLM() hook.
implementation_steps: Import and use the useLLM() hook in EnhancedChatInterface.jsx.
Add a dropdown for provider selection and display the current provider as a badge.
Wire up the dropdown to trigger provider switching logic.
Test UI updates and provider switching in the chat interface.
